verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations; <S%H1471><s%> Laud <S%H9576><s%> Him, all <S%H3605><s%> peoples! <S%H523><s%>

For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1396><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> us, And the truth <S%H571><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
